text: Gaulstown Barrow is a round barrow (bowl barrow) and National Monument located in County Meath, Ireland. Schematic plans of a bowl barrow. ==Location== Gaulstown Barrow is southwest of Duleek, just north of the Nanny. ==Description== Gaulstown Barrow is a circular bowl barrow built over a tomb, probably dating to the late Neolithic or early Bronze Age. ==References== Category:Archaeological sites in County Meath Category:National Monuments in County Meath
title: Gaulstown Barrow
